00085 static Lattice *vgroup_edit_lattice(Object *ob)
00086 {
00087     Lattice *lt= ob->data;
00088     BLI_assert(ob->type==OB_LATTICE);
00089     return (lt->editlatt)? lt->editlatt->latt: lt;
00090 }

00092 int ED_vgroup_object_is_edit_mode(Object *ob)
00093 {
00094     if (ob->type == OB_MESH)
00095         return (BMEdit_FromObject(ob) != NULL);
00096     else if (ob->type == OB_LATTICE)
00097         return (((Lattice*)ob->data)->editlatt != NULL);
00098 
00099     return 0;
00100 }

00102 bDeformGroup *ED_vgroup_add_name(Object *ob, const char *name)
00103 {
00104     bDeformGroup *defgroup;
00105 
00106     if (!ob || !OB_TYPE_SUPPORT_VGROUP(ob->type))
00107         return NULL;
00108     
00109     defgroup = MEM_callocN(sizeof(bDeformGroup), "add deformGroup");
00110 
00111     BLI_strncpy(defgroup->name, name, sizeof(defgroup->name));
00112 
00113     BLI_addtail(&ob->defbase, defgroup);
00114     defgroup_unique_name(defgroup, ob);
00115 
00116     ob->actdef = BLI_countlist(&ob->defbase);
00117 
00118     return defgroup;
00119 }

00121 bDeformGroup *ED_vgroup_add(Object *ob) 
00122 {
00123     return ED_vgroup_add_name(ob, "Group");
00124 }
00125 
00126 void ED_vgroup_delete(Object *ob, bDeformGroup *defgroup) 
00127 {
00128     bDeformGroup *dg = (bDeformGroup *)ob->defbase.first;
00129 
00130     while (dg) {
00131         if (dg == defgroup)
00132             break;
00133         dg = dg->next;
00134     }
00135 
00136     if (dg == NULL)
00137         return;
00138 
00139     if (ED_vgroup_object_is_edit_mode(ob))
00140         vgroup_delete_edit_mode(ob, dg);
00141     else
00142         vgroup_delete_object_mode(ob, dg);
00143 }
00144 
00145 void ED_vgroup_clear(Object *ob)
00146 {
00147     bDeformGroup *dg= (bDeformGroup *)ob->defbase.first;
00148     int edit_mode= ED_vgroup_object_is_edit_mode(ob);
00149 
00150     while (dg) {
00151         bDeformGroup *next_dg= dg->next;
00152 
00153         if (edit_mode)
00154             vgroup_delete_edit_mode(ob, dg);
00155         else
00156             vgroup_delete_object_mode(ob, dg);
00157 
00158         dg= next_dg;
00159     }
00160 }

00162 int ED_vgroup_data_create(ID *id)
00163 {
00164     /* create deform verts */
00165 
00166     if (GS(id->name)==ID_ME) {
00167         Mesh *me= (Mesh *)id;
00168         me->dvert= CustomData_add_layer(&me->vdata, CD_MDEFORMVERT, CD_CALLOC, NULL, me->totvert);
00169         return TRUE;
00170     }
00171     else if (GS(id->name)==ID_LT) {
00172         Lattice *lt= (Lattice *)id;
00173         lt->dvert= MEM_callocN(sizeof(MDeformVert)*lt->pntsu*lt->pntsv*lt->pntsw, "lattice deformVert");
00174         return TRUE;
00175     }
00176     else {
00177         return FALSE;
00178     }
00179 }

00181 static int ED_vgroup_give_parray(ID *id, MDeformVert ***dvert_arr, int *dvert_tot, const short use_vert_sel)
00182 {
00183     *dvert_tot = 0;
00184     *dvert_arr = NULL;
00185 
00186     if (id) {
00187         switch(GS(id->name)) {
00188             case ID_ME:
00189             {
00190                 Mesh *me = (Mesh *)id;
00191 
00192                 if (me->edit_btmesh) {
00193                     BMEditMesh *em = me->edit_btmesh;
00194                     BMIter iter;
00195                     BMVert *eve;
00196                     int i;
00197 
00198                     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&em->bm->vdata, CD_MDEFORMVERT)) {
00199                         return 0;
00200                     }
00201 
00202                     i = em->bm->totvert;
00203 
00204                     *dvert_arr= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(void*)*i, "vgroup parray from me");
00205                     *dvert_tot = i;
00206 
00207                     i = 0;
00208                     if (use_vert_sel) {
00209                         BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00210                             (*dvert_arr)[i] = BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT) ?
00211                                               CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_MDEFORMVERT) : NULL;
00212                             i++;
00213                         }
00214                     }
00215                     else {
00216                         BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00217                             (*dvert_arr)[i] = CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
00218                             i++;
00219                         }
00220                     }
00221 
00222                     return 1;
00223                 }
00224                 else if (me->dvert) {
00225                     MVert *mvert= me->mvert;
00226                     MDeformVert *dvert= me->dvert;
00227                     int i;
00228 
00229                     *dvert_tot= me->totvert;
00230                     *dvert_arr= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(void*)*me->totvert, "vgroup parray from me");
00231 
00232                     if (use_vert_sel) {
00233                         for (i=0; i<me->totvert; i++) {
00234                             (*dvert_arr)[i] = (mvert[i].flag & SELECT) ?
00235                                                &dvert[i] : NULL;
00236                         }
00237                     }
00238                     else {
00239                         for (i=0; i<me->totvert; i++) {
00240                             (*dvert_arr)[i] = me->dvert + i;
00241                         }
00242                     }
00243 
00244                     return 1;
00245                 }
00246                 else {
00247                     return 0;
00248                 }
00249             }
00250             case ID_LT:
00251             {
00252                 int i=0;
00253 
00254                 Lattice *lt= (Lattice *)id;
00255                 lt= (lt->editlatt)? lt->editlatt->latt: lt;
00256 
00257                 if (lt->dvert) {
00258                     BPoint *def= lt->def;
00259                     *dvert_tot= lt->pntsu*lt->pntsv*lt->pntsw;
00260                     *dvert_arr= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(void*)*(*dvert_tot), "vgroup parray from me");
00261 
00262                     if (use_vert_sel) {
00263                         for (i=0; i<*dvert_tot; i++) {
00264                             (*dvert_arr)[i] = (def->f1 & SELECT) ?
00265                                                &lt->dvert[i] : NULL;
00266                         }
00267                     }
00268                     else {
00269                         for (i=0; i<*dvert_tot; i++) {
00270                             (*dvert_arr)[i] = lt->dvert + i;
00271                         }
00272                     }
00273 
00274                     return 1;
00275                 }
00276                 else {
00277                     return 0;
00278                 }
00279             }
00280         }
00281     }
00282 
00283     return 0;
00284 }

00286 /* returns true if the id type supports weights */
00287 int ED_vgroup_give_array(ID *id, MDeformVert **dvert_arr, int *dvert_tot)
00288 {
00289     if (id) {
00290         switch(GS(id->name)) {
00291             case ID_ME:
00292             {
00293                 Mesh *me = (Mesh *)id;
00294                 *dvert_arr= me->dvert;
00295                 *dvert_tot= me->totvert;
00296                 return TRUE;
00297             }
00298             case ID_LT:
00299             {
00300                 Lattice *lt= (Lattice *)id;
00301                 lt= (lt->editlatt)? lt->editlatt->latt: lt;
00302                 *dvert_arr= lt->dvert;
00303                 *dvert_tot= lt->pntsu*lt->pntsv*lt->pntsw;
00304                 return TRUE;
00305             }
00306         }
00307     }
00308 
00309     *dvert_arr= NULL;
00310     *dvert_tot= 0;
00311     return FALSE;
00312 }

00314 /* matching index only */
00315 int ED_vgroup_copy_array(Object *ob, Object *ob_from)
00316 {
00317     MDeformVert **dvert_array_from, **dvf;
00318     MDeformVert **dvert_array, **dv;
00319     int dvert_tot_from;
00320     int dvert_tot;
00321     int i;
00322     int defbase_tot_from= BLI_countlist(&ob_from->defbase);
00323     int defbase_tot= BLI_countlist(&ob->defbase);
00324     short new_vgroup= FALSE;
00325 
00326     ED_vgroup_give_parray(ob_from->data, &dvert_array_from, &dvert_tot_from, FALSE);
00327     ED_vgroup_give_parray(ob->data, &dvert_array, &dvert_tot, FALSE);
00328 
00329     if ((dvert_array == NULL) && (dvert_array_from != NULL) && ED_vgroup_data_create(ob->data)) {
00330         ED_vgroup_give_parray(ob->data, &dvert_array, &dvert_tot, FALSE);
00331         new_vgroup= TRUE;
00332     }
00333 
00334     if (ob==ob_from || dvert_tot==0 || (dvert_tot != dvert_tot_from) || dvert_array_from==NULL || dvert_array==NULL) {
00335         if (dvert_array) MEM_freeN(dvert_array);
00336         if (dvert_array_from) MEM_freeN(dvert_array_from);
00337 
00338         if (new_vgroup == TRUE) {
00339             /* free the newly added vgroup since it wasn't compatible */
00340             vgroup_delete_all(ob);
00341         }
00342         return 0;
00343     }
00344 
00345     /* do the copy */
00346     BLI_freelistN(&ob->defbase);
00347     BLI_duplicatelist(&ob->defbase, &ob_from->defbase);
00348     ob->actdef= ob_from->actdef;
00349 
00350     if (defbase_tot_from < defbase_tot) {
00351         /* correct vgroup indices because the number of vgroups is being reduced. */
00352         int *remap= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(int) * (defbase_tot + 1), __func__);
00353         for (i=0; i<=defbase_tot_from; i++) remap[i]= i;
00354         for (; i<=defbase_tot; i++) remap[i]= 0; /* can't use these, so disable */
00355 
00356         vgroup_remap_update_users(ob, remap);
00357         MEM_freeN(remap);
00358     }
00359 
00360     dvf= dvert_array_from;
00361     dv= dvert_array;
00362 
00363     for (i=0; i<dvert_tot; i++, dvf++, dv++) {
00364         if ((*dv)->dw)
00365             MEM_freeN((*dv)->dw);
00366 
00367         *(*dv)= *(*dvf);
00368 
00369         if ((*dv)->dw)
00370             (*dv)->dw= MEM_dupallocN((*dv)->dw);
00371     }
00372 
00373     MEM_freeN(dvert_array);
00374     MEM_freeN(dvert_array_from);
00375 
00376     return 1;
00377 }

00379 
00380 /* for Mesh in Object mode */
00381 /* allows editmode for Lattice */
00382 static void ED_vgroup_nr_vert_add(Object *ob,
00383                                   const int def_nr, const int vertnum,
00384                                   const float weight, const int assignmode)
00385 {
00386     /* add the vert to the deform group with the
00387      * specified number
00388      */
00389     MDeformVert *dvert= NULL;
00390     int tot;
00391 
00392     /* get the vert */
00393     ED_vgroup_give_array(ob->data, &dvert, &tot);
00394     
00395     if (dvert==NULL)
00396         return;
00397 
00398     /* check that vertnum is valid before trying to get the relevant dvert */
00399     if ((vertnum < 0) || (vertnum >= tot))
00400         return;
00401 
00402 
00403     if (dvert) {
00404         MDeformVert *dv= &dvert[vertnum];
00405         MDeformWeight *dw;
00406 
00407         /* Lets first check to see if this vert is
00408          * already in the weight group -- if so
00409          * lets update it
00410          */
00411 
00412         dw= defvert_find_index(dv, def_nr);
00413 
00414         if (dw) {
00415             switch(assignmode) {
00416             case WEIGHT_REPLACE:
00417                 dw->weight = weight;
00418                 break;
00419             case WEIGHT_ADD:
00420                 dw->weight += weight;
00421                 if (dw->weight >= 1.0f)
00422                     dw->weight = 1.0f;
00423                 break;
00424             case WEIGHT_SUBTRACT:
00425                 dw->weight -= weight;
00426                 /* if the weight is zero or less then
00427                  * remove the vert from the deform group
00428                  */
00429                 if (dw->weight <= 0.0f) {
00430                     defvert_remove_group(dv, dw);
00431                 }
00432                 break;
00433             }
00434         }
00435         else {
00436             /* if the vert wasn't in the deform group then
00437              * we must take a different form of action ...
00438              */
00439 
00440             switch(assignmode) {
00441             case WEIGHT_SUBTRACT:
00442                 /* if we are subtracting then we don't
00443                  * need to do anything
00444                  */
00445                 return;
00446 
00447             case WEIGHT_REPLACE:
00448             case WEIGHT_ADD:
00449                 /* if we are doing an additive assignment, then
00450                  * we need to create the deform weight
00451                  */
00452 
00453                 /* we checked if the vertex was added before so no need to test again, simply add */
00454                 defvert_add_index_notest(dv, def_nr, weight);
00455             }
00456         }
00457     }
00458 }
00459 
00460 /* called while not in editmode */
00461 void ED_vgroup_vert_add(Object *ob, bDeformGroup *dg, int vertnum, float weight, int assignmode)
00462 {
00463     /* add the vert to the deform group with the
00464      * specified assign mode
00465      */
00466     const int def_nr= BLI_findindex(&ob->defbase, dg);
00467 
00468     MDeformVert *dv= NULL;
00469     int tot;
00470 
00471     /* get the deform group number, exit if
00472      * it can't be found
00473      */
00474     if (def_nr < 0) return;
00475 
00476     /* if there's no deform verts then create some,
00477      */
00478     if (ED_vgroup_give_array(ob->data, &dv, &tot) && dv==NULL)
00479         ED_vgroup_data_create(ob->data);
00480 
00481     /* call another function to do the work
00482      */
00483     ED_vgroup_nr_vert_add(ob, def_nr, vertnum, weight, assignmode);
00484 }
00485 
00486 /* mesh object mode, lattice can be in editmode */
00487 void ED_vgroup_vert_remove(Object *ob, bDeformGroup *dg, int vertnum)
00488 {
00489     /* This routine removes the vertex from the specified
00490      * deform group.
00491      */
00492 
00493     /* TODO, this is slow in a loop, better pass def_nr directly, but leave for later... - campbell */
00494     const int def_nr= BLI_findindex(&ob->defbase, dg);
00495 
00496     if (def_nr != -1) {
00497         MDeformVert *dvert= NULL;
00498         int tot;
00499 
00500         /* get the deform vertices corresponding to the
00501          * vertnum
00502          */
00503         ED_vgroup_give_array(ob->data, &dvert, &tot);
00504 
00505         if (dvert) {
00506             MDeformVert *dv= &dvert[vertnum];
00507             MDeformWeight *dw;
00508 
00509             dw= defvert_find_index(dv, def_nr);
00510             defvert_remove_group(dv, dw); /* dw can be NULL */
00511         }
00512     }
00513 }
00514 
00515 static float get_vert_def_nr(Object *ob, const int def_nr, const int vertnum)
00516 {
00517     MDeformVert *dv= NULL;
00518     BMVert *eve;
00519     Mesh *me;
00520 
00521     /* get the deform vertices corresponding to the vertnum */
00522     if (ob->type==OB_MESH) {
00523         me= ob->data;
00524 
00525         if (me->edit_btmesh) {
00526             eve= BM_vert_at_index(me->edit_btmesh->bm, vertnum);
00527             if (!eve) {
00528                 return 0.0f;
00529             }
00530             dv= CustomData_bmesh_get(&me->edit_btmesh->bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
00531         }
00532         else {
00533             if (vertnum >= me->totvert) {
00534                 return 0.0f;
00535             }
00536             dv = &me->dvert[vertnum];
00537         }
00538     }
00539     else if (ob->type==OB_LATTICE) {
00540         Lattice *lt= vgroup_edit_lattice(ob);
00541 
00542         if (lt->dvert) {
00543             if (vertnum >= lt->pntsu*lt->pntsv*lt->pntsw) {
00544                 return 0.0f;
00545             }
00546             dv = &lt->dvert[vertnum];
00547         }
00548     }
00549     
00550     if (dv) {
00551         MDeformWeight *dw= defvert_find_index(dv, def_nr);
00552         if (dw) {
00553             return dw->weight;
00554         }
00555     }
00556 
00557     return -1;
00558 }
00559 
00560 float ED_vgroup_vert_weight(Object *ob, bDeformGroup *dg, int vertnum)
00561 {
00562     const int def_nr= BLI_findindex(&ob->defbase, dg);
00563 
00564     if (def_nr == -1) {
00565         return -1;
00566     }
00567 
00568     return get_vert_def_nr(ob, def_nr, vertnum);
00569 }

00573     ob->actdef= defgroup_name_index(ob, name) + 1;

00576 /********************** Operator Implementations *********************/
00577 
00578 /* only in editmode */
00579 static void vgroup_select_verts(Object *ob, int select)
00580 {
00581     const int def_nr= ob->actdef-1;
00582     MDeformVert *dv;
00583 
00584     if (!BLI_findlink(&ob->defbase, def_nr)) {
00585         return;
00586     }
00587 
00588     if (ob->type == OB_MESH) {
00589         Mesh *me= ob->data;
00590 
00591         if (me->edit_btmesh) {
00592             BMEditMesh *em = me->edit_btmesh;
00593             BMIter iter;
00594             BMVert *eve;
00595 
00596             BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00597                 if (!BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00598                     dv= CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
00599                     if (defvert_find_index(dv, def_nr)) {
00600                         BM_vert_select_set(em->bm, eve, select);
00601                     }
00602                 }
00603             }
00604 
00605             /* this has to be called, because this function operates on vertices only */
00606             if (select) EDBM_select_flush(em);  // vertices to edges/faces
00607             else EDBM_deselect_flush(em);
00608         }
00609         else {
00610             if (me->dvert) {
00611                 MVert *mv;
00612                 MDeformVert *dv;
00613                 int i;
00614 
00615                 mv = me->mvert;
00616                 dv = me->dvert;
00617 
00618                 for (i=0; i<me->totvert; i++, mv++, dv++) {
00619                     if (!(mv->flag & ME_HIDE)) {
00620                         if (defvert_find_index(dv, def_nr)) {
00621                             if (select)  mv->flag |=  SELECT;
00622                             else         mv->flag &= ~SELECT;
00623                         }
00624                     }
00625                 }
00626 
00627                 paintvert_flush_flags(ob);
00628             }
00629         }
00630     }
00631     else if (ob->type == OB_LATTICE) {
00632         Lattice *lt= vgroup_edit_lattice(ob);
00633         
00634         if (lt->dvert) {
00635             BPoint *bp;
00636             int a, tot;
00637             
00638             dv= lt->dvert;
00639 
00640             tot= lt->pntsu*lt->pntsv*lt->pntsw;
00641             for (a=0, bp= lt->def; a<tot; a++, bp++, dv++) {
00642                 if (defvert_find_index(dv, def_nr)) {
00643                     if (select)  bp->f1 |=  SELECT;
00644                     else         bp->f1 &= ~SELECT;
00645                 }
00646             }
00647         }
00648     }
00649 }
00650 
00651 static void vgroup_duplicate(Object *ob)
00652 {
00653     bDeformGroup *dg, *cdg;
00654     char name[sizeof(dg->name)];
00655     MDeformWeight *dw_org, *dw_cpy;
00656     MDeformVert **dvert_array=NULL;
00657     int i, idg, icdg, dvert_tot=0;
00658 
00659     dg = BLI_findlink(&ob->defbase, (ob->actdef-1));
00660     if (!dg)
00661         return;
00662     
00663     if (!strstr(dg->name, "_copy")) {
00664         BLI_snprintf(name, sizeof(name), "%s_copy", dg->name);
00665     }
00666     else {
00667         BLI_snprintf(name, sizeof(name), "%s", dg->name);
00668     }
00669 
00670     cdg = defgroup_duplicate(dg);
00671     BLI_strncpy(cdg->name, name, sizeof(cdg->name));
00672     defgroup_unique_name(cdg, ob);
00673 
00674     BLI_addtail(&ob->defbase, cdg);
00675 
00676     idg = (ob->actdef-1);
00677     ob->actdef = BLI_countlist(&ob->defbase);
00678     icdg = (ob->actdef-1);
00679 
00680     /* TODO, we might want to allow only copy selected verts here? - campbell */
00681     ED_vgroup_give_parray(ob->data, &dvert_array, &dvert_tot, FALSE);
00682 
00683     if (dvert_array) {
00684         for (i = 0; i < dvert_tot; i++) {
00685             MDeformVert *dv= dvert_array[i];
00686             dw_org = defvert_find_index(dv, idg);
00687             if (dw_org) {
00688                 /* defvert_verify_index re-allocs org so need to store the weight first */
00689                 dw_cpy = defvert_verify_index(dv, icdg);
00690                 dw_cpy->weight = dw_org->weight;
00691             }
00692         }
00693 
00694         MEM_freeN(dvert_array);
00695     }
00696 }
00697 
00698 static void vgroup_normalize(Object *ob)
00699 {
00700     MDeformWeight *dw;
00701     MDeformVert *dv, **dvert_array=NULL;
00702     int i, dvert_tot=0;
00703     const int def_nr= ob->actdef-1;
00704 
00705     const int use_vert_sel = (ob->type == OB_MESH && ((Mesh *)ob->data)->editflag & ME_EDIT_VERT_SEL) != 0;
00706 
00707     if (!BLI_findlink(&ob->defbase, def_nr)) {
00708         return;
00709     }
00710 
00711     ED_vgroup_give_parray(ob->data, &dvert_array, &dvert_tot, use_vert_sel);
00712 
00713     if (dvert_array) {
00714         float weight_max = 0.0f;
00715 
00716         for (i = 0; i < dvert_tot; i++) {
00717 
00718             /* in case its not selected */
00719             if (!(dv = dvert_array[i])) {
00720                 continue;
00721             }
00722 
00723             dw = defvert_find_index(dv, def_nr);
00724             if (dw) {
00725                 weight_max = MAX2(dw->weight, weight_max);
00726             }
00727         }
00728 
00729         if (weight_max > 0.0f) {
00730             for (i = 0; i < dvert_tot; i++) {
00731                 
00732                 /* in case its not selected */
00733                 if (!(dv = dvert_array[i])) {
00734                     continue;
00735                 }
00736 
00737                 dw = defvert_find_index(dv, def_nr);
00738                 if (dw) {
00739                     dw->weight /= weight_max;
00740                     
00741                     /* in case of division errors with very low weights */
00742                     CLAMP(dw->weight, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00743                 }
00744             }
00745         }
00746 
00747         MEM_freeN(dvert_array);
00748     }
00749 }
00750 
00751 /* This finds all of the vertices face-connected to vert by an edge and returns a
00752  * MEM_allocated array of indices of size count.
00753  * count is an int passed by reference so it can be assigned the value of the length here. */
00754 static int* getSurroundingVerts(Mesh *me, int vert, int *count)
00755 {
00756     MPoly *mp = me->mpoly;
00757     int i = me->totpoly;
00758     /* Instead of looping twice on all polys and loops, and use a temp array, let's rather
00759      * use a BLI_array, with a reasonable starting/reserved size (typically, there are not
00760      * many vertices face-linked to another one, even 8 might be too high...). */
00761     int *verts = NULL;
00762     BLI_array_declare(verts);
00763 
00764     BLI_array_reserve(verts, 8);
00765     while (i--) {
00766         int j = mp->totloop;
00767         int first_l = mp->totloop - 1;
00768         MLoop *ml = &me->mloop[mp->loopstart];
00769         while (j--) {
00770             /* XXX This assume a vert can only be once in a poly, even though
00771              *     it seems logical to me, not totally sure of that. */
00772             if (ml->v == vert) {
00773                 int a, b, k;
00774                 if (j == first_l) {
00775                     /* We are on the first corner. */
00776                     a = ml[1].v;
00777                     b = ml[j].v;
00778                 }
00779                 else if (!j) {
00780                     /* We are on the last corner. */
00781                     a = (ml-1)->v;
00782                     b = me->mloop[mp->loopstart].v;
00783                 }
00784                 else {
00785                     a = (ml-1)->v;
00786                     b = (ml+1)->v;
00787                 }
00788 
00789                 /* Append a and b verts to array, if not yet present. */
00790                 k = BLI_array_count(verts);
00791                 /* XXX Maybe a == b is enough? */
00792                 while (k-- && !(a == b && a == -1)) {
00793                     if (verts[k] == a)
00794                         a = -1;
00795                     else if (verts[k] == b)
00796                         b = -1;
00797                 }
00798                 if (a != -1)
00799                     BLI_array_append(verts, a);
00800                 if (b != -1)
00801                     BLI_array_append(verts, b);
00802 
00803                 /* Vert found in this poly, we can go to next one! */
00804                 break;
00805             }
00806             ml++;
00807         }
00808         mp++;
00809     }
00810 
00811     /* Do not free the array! */
00812     *count = BLI_array_count(verts);
00813     return verts;
00814 }
00815 
00816 /* get a single point in space by averaging a point cloud (vectors of size 3)
00817  * coord is the place the average is stored, points is the point cloud, count is the number of points in the cloud
00818  */
00819 static void getSingleCoordinate(MVert *points, int count, float coord[3])
00820 {
00821     int i;
00822     zero_v3(coord);
00823     for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
00824         add_v3_v3(coord, points[i].co);
00825     }
00826     mul_v3_fl(coord, 1.0f/count);
00827 }
00828 
00829 /* given a plane and a start and end position,
00830  * compute the amount of vertical distance relative to the plane and store it in dists,
00831  * then get the horizontal and vertical change and store them in changes
00832  */
00833 static void getVerticalAndHorizontalChange(const float norm[3], float d, const float coord[3],
00834                                            const float start[3], float distToStart,
00835                                            float *end, float (*changes)[2], float *dists, int index)
00836 {
00837     // A=Q-((Q-P).N)N
00838     // D = (a*x0 + b*y0 +c*z0 +d)
00839     float projA[3], projB[3];
00840 
00841     closest_to_plane_v3(projA, coord, norm, start);
00842     closest_to_plane_v3(projB, coord, norm, end);
00843     // (vertical and horizontal refer to the plane's y and xz respectively)
00844     // vertical distance
00845     dists[index] = dot_v3v3(norm, end) + d;
00846     // vertical change
00847     changes[index][0] = dists[index] - distToStart;
00848     //printf("vc %f %f\n", distance(end, projB, 3)-distance(start, projA, 3), changes[index][0]);
00849     // horizontal change
00850     changes[index][1] = len_v3v3(projA, projB);
00851 }
00852 
00853 // I need the derived mesh to be forgotten so the positions are recalculated with weight changes (see dm_deform_recalc)
00854 static void dm_deform_clear(DerivedMesh *dm, Object *ob)
00855 {
00856     if (ob->derivedDeform && (ob->derivedDeform)==dm) {
00857         ob->derivedDeform->needsFree = 1;
00858         ob->derivedDeform->release(ob->derivedDeform);
00859         ob->derivedDeform = NULL;
00860     }
00861     else if (dm) {
00862         dm->needsFree = 1;
00863         dm->release(dm);
00864     }
00865 }
00866 
00867 /* recalculate the deformation */
00868 static DerivedMesh* dm_deform_recalc(Scene *scene, Object *ob)
00869 {
00870     return mesh_get_derived_deform(scene, ob, CD_MASK_BAREMESH);
00871 }
00872 
00873 /* by changing nonzero weights, try to move a vertex in me->mverts with index 'index' to
00874  * distToBe distance away from the provided plane strength can change distToBe so that it moves
00875  * towards distToBe by that percentage cp changes how much the weights are adjusted
00876  * to check the distance
00877  *
00878  * index is the index of the vertex being moved
00879  * norm and d are the plane's properties for the equation: ax + by + cz + d = 0
00880  * coord is a point on the plane
00881  */
00882 static void moveCloserToDistanceFromPlane(Scene *scene, Object *ob, Mesh *me, int index, float norm[3],
00883                                           float coord[3], float d, float distToBe, float strength, float cp)
00884 {
00885     DerivedMesh *dm;
00886     MDeformWeight *dw;
00887     MVert m;
00888     MDeformVert *dvert = me->dvert+index;
00889     int totweight = dvert->totweight;
00890     float oldw = 0;
00891     float oldPos[3] = {0};
00892     float vc, hc, dist = 0.0f;
00893     int i, k;
00894     float (*changes)[2] = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float *)*totweight*2, "vertHorzChange");
00895     float *dists = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float)*totweight, "distance");
00896 
00897     /* track if up or down moved it closer for each bone */
00898     int *upDown = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*totweight, "upDownTracker");
00899 
00900     int *dwIndices = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*totweight, "dwIndexTracker");
00901     float distToStart;
00902     int bestIndex = 0;
00903     char wasChange;
00904     char wasUp;
00905     int lastIndex = -1;
00906     float originalDistToBe = distToBe;
00907     do {
00908         wasChange = FALSE;
00909         dm = dm_deform_recalc(scene, ob);
00910         dm->getVert(dm, index, &m);
00911         copy_v3_v3(oldPos, m.co);
00912         distToStart = dot_v3v3(norm, oldPos) + d;
00913 
00914         if (distToBe == originalDistToBe) {
00915             distToBe += distToStart - distToStart*strength;
00916         }
00917         for (i = 0; i < totweight; i++) {
00918             dwIndices[i] = i;
00919             dw = (dvert->dw+i);
00920             vc = hc = 0;
00921             if (!dw->weight) {
00922                 changes[i][0] = 0;
00923                 changes[i][1] = 0;
00924                 dists[i] = distToStart;
00925                 continue;
00926             }
00927             for (k = 0; k < 2; k++) {
00928                 if (dm) {
00929                     dm_deform_clear(dm, ob); dm = NULL;
00930                 }
00931                 oldw = dw->weight;
00932                 if (k) {
00933                     dw->weight *= 1+cp;
00934                 }
00935                 else {
00936                     dw->weight /= 1+cp;
00937                 }
00938                 if (dw->weight == oldw) {
00939                     changes[i][0] = 0;
00940                     changes[i][1] = 0;
00941                     dists[i] = distToStart;
00942                     break;
00943                 }
00944                 if (dw->weight > 1) {
00945                     dw->weight = 1;
00946                 }
00947                 dm = dm_deform_recalc(scene, ob);
00948                 dm->getVert(dm, index, &m);
00949                 getVerticalAndHorizontalChange(norm, d, coord, oldPos, distToStart, m.co, changes, dists, i);
00950                 dw->weight = oldw;
00951                 if (!k) {
00952                     vc = changes[i][0];
00953                     hc = changes[i][1];
00954                     dist = dists[i];
00955                 }
00956                 else {
00957                     if (fabs(dist - distToBe) < fabs(dists[i] - distToBe)) {
00958                         upDown[i] = 0;
00959                         changes[i][0] = vc;
00960                         changes[i][1] = hc;
00961                         dists[i] = dist;
00962                     }
00963                     else {
00964                         upDown[i] = 1;
00965                     }
00966                     if (fabs(dists[i] - distToBe) > fabs(distToStart - distToBe)) {
00967                         changes[i][0] = 0;
00968                         changes[i][1] = 0;
00969                         dists[i] = distToStart;
00970                     }
00971                 }
00972             }
00973         }
00974         // sort the changes by the vertical change
00975         for (k = 0; k < totweight; k++) {
00976             float tf;
00977             int ti;
00978             bestIndex = k;
00979             for (i = k+1; i < totweight; i++) {
00980                 dist = dists[i];
00981 
00982                 if (fabs(dist) > fabs(dists[i])) {
00983                     bestIndex = i;
00984                 }
00985             }
00986             // switch with k
00987             if (bestIndex != k) {
00988                 ti = upDown[k];
00989                 upDown[k] = upDown[bestIndex];
00990                 upDown[bestIndex] = ti;
00991 
00992                 ti = dwIndices[k];
00993                 dwIndices[k] = dwIndices[bestIndex];
00994                 dwIndices[bestIndex] = ti;
00995 
00996                 tf = changes[k][0];
00997                 changes[k][0] = changes[bestIndex][0];
00998                 changes[bestIndex][0] = tf;
00999 
01000                 tf = changes[k][1];
01001                 changes[k][1] = changes[bestIndex][1];
01002                 changes[bestIndex][1] = tf;
01003 
01004                 tf = dists[k];
01005                 dists[k] = dists[bestIndex];
01006                 dists[bestIndex] = tf;
01007             }
01008         }
01009         bestIndex = -1;
01010         // find the best change with an acceptable horizontal change
01011         for (i = 0; i < totweight; i++) {
01012             if (fabs(changes[i][0]) > fabs(changes[i][1]*2.0f)) {
01013                 bestIndex = i;
01014                 break;
01015             }
01016         }
01017         if (bestIndex != -1) {
01018             wasChange = TRUE;
01019             // it is a good place to stop if it tries to move the opposite direction
01020             // (relative to the plane) of last time
01021             if (lastIndex != -1) {
01022                 if (wasUp != upDown[bestIndex]) {
01023                     wasChange = FALSE;
01024                 }
01025             }
01026             lastIndex = bestIndex;
01027             wasUp = upDown[bestIndex];
01028             dw = (dvert->dw+dwIndices[bestIndex]);
01029             oldw = dw->weight;
01030             if (upDown[bestIndex]) {
01031                 dw->weight *= 1+cp;
01032             }
01033             else {
01034                 dw->weight /= 1+cp;
01035             }
01036             if (dw->weight > 1) {
01037                 dw->weight = 1;
01038             }
01039             if (oldw == dw->weight) {
01040                 wasChange = FALSE;
01041             }
01042             if (dm) {
01043                 dm_deform_clear(dm, ob); dm = NULL;
01044             }
01045         }
01046     } while (wasChange && (distToStart-distToBe)/fabsf(distToStart-distToBe) ==
01047                          (dists[bestIndex]-distToBe)/fabsf(dists[bestIndex]-distToBe));
01048     MEM_freeN(upDown);
01049     MEM_freeN(changes);
01050     MEM_freeN(dists);
01051     MEM_freeN(dwIndices);
01052 }
01053 
01054 /* this is used to try to smooth a surface by only adjusting the nonzero weights of a vertex 
01055  * but it could be used to raise or lower an existing 'bump.' */
01056 static void vgroup_fix(Scene *scene, Object *ob, float distToBe, float strength, float cp)
01057 {
01058     int i;
01059 
01060     Mesh *me = ob->data;
01061     MVert *mvert = me->mvert;
01062     int *verts = NULL;
01063     if (!(me->editflag & ME_EDIT_VERT_SEL))
01064         return;
01065     for (i = 0; i < me->totvert && mvert; i++, mvert++) {
01066         if (mvert->flag & SELECT) {
01067             int count=0;
01068             if ((verts = getSurroundingVerts(me, i, &count))) {
01069                 MVert m;
01070                 MVert *p = MEM_callocN(sizeof(MVert)*(count), "deformedPoints");
01071                 int k;
01072 
01073                 DerivedMesh *dm = mesh_get_derived_deform(scene, ob, CD_MASK_BAREMESH);
01074                 k = count;
01075                 while (k--) {
01076                     dm->getVert(dm, verts[k], &m);
01077                     p[k] = m;
01078                 }
01079                 
01080                 if (count >= 3) {
01081                     float d /*, dist */ /* UNUSED */, mag;
01082                     float coord[3];
01083                     float norm[3];
01084                     getSingleCoordinate(p, count, coord);
01085                     dm->getVert(dm, i, &m);
01086                     sub_v3_v3v3(norm, m.co, coord);
01087                     mag= normalize_v3(norm);
01088                     if (mag) { /* zeros fix */
01089                         d = -dot_v3v3(norm, coord);
01090                         /* dist = (dot_v3v3(norm, m.co) + d); */ /* UNUSED */
01091                         moveCloserToDistanceFromPlane(scene, ob, me, i, norm, coord, d, distToBe, strength, cp);
01092                     }
01093                 }
01094 
01095                 MEM_freeN(verts);
01096                 MEM_freeN(p);
01097             }
01098         }
01099     }
01100 }
01101 
01102 static void vgroup_levels(Object *ob, float offset, float gain)
01103 {
01104     MDeformWeight *dw;
01105     MDeformVert *dv, **dvert_array=NULL;
01106     int i, dvert_tot=0;
01107     const int def_nr= ob->actdef-1;
01108 
01109     const int use_vert_sel = (ob->type == OB_MESH && ((Mesh *)ob->data)->editflag & ME_EDIT_VERT_SEL) != 0;
01110 
01111     if (!BLI_findlink(&ob->defbase, def_nr)) {
01112         return;
01113     }
01114 
01115     ED_vgroup_give_parray(ob->data, &dvert_array, &dvert_tot, use_vert_sel);
01116 
01117     if (dvert_array) {
01118         for (i = 0; i < dvert_tot; i++) {
01119 
01120             /* in case its not selected */
01121             if (!(dv = dvert_array[i])) {
01122                 continue;
01123             }
01124 
01125             dw = defvert_find_index(dv, def_nr);
01126             if (dw) {
01127                 dw->weight = gain * (dw->weight + offset);
01128 
01129                 CLAMP(dw->weight, 0.0f, 1.0f);
01130             }
01131         }
01132 
01133         MEM_freeN(dvert_array);
01134     }
01135 }
01136 
01137 /* TODO - select between groups */
01138 static void vgroup_normalize_all(Object *ob, int lock_active)
01139 {
01140     MDeformVert *dv, **dvert_array=NULL;
01141     int i, dvert_tot=0;
01142     const int def_nr= ob->actdef-1;
01143 
01144     const int use_vert_sel = (ob->type == OB_MESH && ((Mesh *)ob->data)->editflag & ME_EDIT_VERT_SEL) != 0;
01145 
01146     if (lock_active && !BLI_findlink(&ob->defbase, def_nr)) {
01147         return;
01148     }
01149 
01150     ED_vgroup_give_parray(ob->data, &dvert_array, &dvert_tot, use_vert_sel);
01151 
01152     if (dvert_array) {
01153         if (lock_active) {
01154 
01155             for (i = 0; i < dvert_tot; i++) {
01156                 /* in case its not selected */
01157                 if (!(dv = dvert_array[i])) {
01158                     continue;
01159                 }
01160 
01161                 defvert_normalize_lock(dv, def_nr);
01162             }
01163         }
01164         else {
01165             for (i = 0; i < dvert_tot; i++) {
01166 
01167                 /* in case its not selected */
01168                 if (!(dv = dvert_array[i])) {
01169                     continue;
01170                 }
01171 
01172                 defvert_normalize(dv);
01173             }
01174         }
01175 
01176         MEM_freeN(dvert_array);
01177     }
01178 }
01179 
01180 
01181 static void vgroup_lock_all(Object *ob, int action)
01182 {
01183     bDeformGroup *dg;
01184 
01185     if (action == SEL_TOGGLE) {
01186         action= SEL_SELECT;
01187         for (dg= ob->defbase.first; dg; dg= dg->next) {
01188             if (dg->flag & DG_LOCK_WEIGHT) {
01189                 action= SEL_DESELECT;
01190                 break;
01191             }
01192         }
01193     }
01194 
01195     for (dg= ob->defbase.first; dg; dg= dg->next) {
01196         switch(action) {
01197             case SEL_SELECT:
01198                 dg->flag |= DG_LOCK_WEIGHT;
01199                 break;
01200             case SEL_DESELECT:
01201                 dg->flag &= ~DG_LOCK_WEIGHT;
01202                 break;
01203             case SEL_INVERT:
01204                 dg->flag ^= DG_LOCK_WEIGHT;
01205                 break;
01206         }
01207     }
01208 }
01209 
01210 static void vgroup_invert(Object *ob, const short auto_assign, const short auto_remove)
01211 {
01212     MDeformWeight *dw;
01213     MDeformVert *dv, **dvert_array=NULL;
01214     int i, dvert_tot=0;
01215     const int def_nr= ob->actdef-1;
01216     const int use_vert_sel = (ob->type == OB_MESH && ((Mesh *)ob->data)->editflag & ME_EDIT_VERT_SEL) != 0;
01217 
01218     if (!BLI_findlink(&ob->defbase, def_nr)) {
01219         return;
01220     }
01221 
01222     ED_vgroup_give_parray(ob->data, &dvert_array, &dvert_tot, use_vert_sel);
01223 
01224     if (dvert_array) {
01225         for (i = 0; i < dvert_tot; i++) {
01226 
01227             /* in case its not selected */
01228             if (!(dv = dvert_array[i])) {
01229                 continue;
01230             }
01231 
01232             if (auto_assign) {
01233                 dw= defvert_verify_index(dv, def_nr);
01234             }
01235             else {
01236                 dw= defvert_find_index(dv, def_nr);
01237             }
01238 
01239             if (dw) {
01240                 dw->weight = 1.0f - dw->weight;
01241 
01242                 if (auto_remove && dw->weight <= 0.0f) {
01243                     defvert_remove_group(dv, dw);
01244                 }
01245             }
01246         }
01247 
01248         MEM_freeN(dvert_array);
01249     }
01250 }
01251 
01252 static void vgroup_blend(Object *ob, const float fac)
01253 {
01254     MDeformVert *dv;
01255     MDeformWeight *dw;
01256     int i, dvert_tot=0;
01257     const int def_nr= ob->actdef - 1;
01258 
01259     BLI_assert(fac >= 0.0 && fac <= 1.0f);
01260 
01261     if (ob->type != OB_MESH) {
01262         return;
01263     }
01264 
01265     if (BLI_findlink(&ob->defbase, def_nr)) {
01266         const float ifac = 1.0f - fac;
01267 
01268         BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(ob);
01269         BMesh *bm = em ? em->bm : NULL;
01270         Mesh  *me = em ? NULL   : ob->data;
01271 
01272         /* bmesh only*/
01273         BMEdge *eed;
01274         BMVert *eve;
01275         BMIter iter;
01276 
01277         /* mesh only */
01278         MDeformVert *dvert_array = NULL;
01279 
01280 
01281         float *vg_weights;
01282         float *vg_users;
01283         int sel1, sel2;
01284 
01285         if (bm) {
01286             BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bm, BM_VERT);
01287             dvert_tot = bm->totvert;
01288         }
01289         else {
01290             dvert_tot = me->totvert;
01291             dvert_array = me->dvert;
01292         }
01293 
01294         vg_weights = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * dvert_tot, "vgroup_blend_f");
01295         vg_users = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int) * dvert_tot, "vgroup_blend_i");
01296 
01297         if (bm) {
01298             BM_ITER_MESH (eed, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
01299                 sel1 = BM_elem_flag_test(eed->v1, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
01300                 sel2 = BM_elem_flag_test(eed->v2, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
01301 
01302                 if (sel1 != sel2) {
01303                     int i1 /* , i2 */;
01304                     /* i1 is always the selected one */
01305                     if (sel1) {
01306                         i1= BM_elem_index_get(eed->v1);
01307                         /* i2= BM_elem_index_get(eed->v2); */ /* UNUSED */
01308                         eve= eed->v2;
01309                     }
01310                     else {
01311                         /* i2= BM_elem_index_get(eed->v1); */ /* UNUSED */
01312                         i1= BM_elem_index_get(eed->v2);
01313                         eve= eed->v1;
01314                     }
01315 
01316                     dv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
01317                     dw = defvert_find_index(dv, def_nr);
01318                     if (dw) {
01319                         vg_weights[i1] += dw->weight;
01320                     }
01321                     vg_users[i1]++;
01322                 }
01323             }
01324 
01325             BM_ITER_MESH_INDEX (eve, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, i) {
01326                 if (BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT) && vg_users[i] > 0) {
01327                     dv = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
01328 
01329                     dw = defvert_verify_index(dv, def_nr);
01330                     dw->weight = (fac * (vg_weights[i] / (float)vg_users[i])) + (ifac * dw->weight);
01331                     /* in case of division errors */
01332                     CLAMP(dw->weight, 0.0f, 1.0f);
01333                 }
01334             }
01335         }
01336         else {
01337             MEdge *ed = me->medge;
01338             MVert *mv;
01339 
01340             for (i = 0; i < me->totedge; i++, ed++) {
01341                 sel1 = me->mvert[ed->v1].flag & SELECT;
01342                 sel2 = me->mvert[ed->v2].flag & SELECT;
01343 
01344                 if (sel1 != sel2) {
01345                     int i1, i2;
01346                     /* i1 is always the selected one */
01347                     if (sel1) {
01348                         i1 = ed->v1;
01349                         i2 = ed->v2;
01350                     }
01351                     else {
01352                         i2 = ed->v1;
01353                         i1 = ed->v2;
01354                     }
01355 
01356                     dv = &dvert_array[i2];
01357                     dw = defvert_find_index(dv, def_nr);
01358                     if (dw) {
01359                         vg_weights[i1] += dw->weight;
01360                     }
01361                     vg_users[i1]++;
01362                 }
01363             }
01364 
01365             mv = me->mvert;
01366             dv = dvert_array;
01367 
01368             for (i = 0; i < dvert_tot; i++, mv++, dv++) {
01369                 if ((mv->flag & SELECT) && (vg_users[i] > 0)) {
01370                     dw = defvert_verify_index(dv, def_nr);
01371                     dw->weight = (fac * (vg_weights[i] / (float)vg_users[i])) + (ifac * dw->weight);
01372 
01373                     /* in case of division errors */
01374                     CLAMP(dw->weight, 0.0f, 1.0f);
01375                 }
01376             }
01377         }
01378 
01379         MEM_freeN(vg_weights);
01380         MEM_freeN(vg_users);
01381     }
01382 }
01383 
01384 static void vgroup_clean(Object *ob, const float epsilon, int keep_single)
01385 {
01386     MDeformWeight *dw;
01387     MDeformVert *dv, **dvert_array=NULL;
01388     int i, dvert_tot=0;
01389     const int def_nr= ob->actdef-1;
01390     const int use_vert_sel = (ob->type == OB_MESH && ((Mesh *)ob->data)->editflag & ME_EDIT_VERT_SEL) != 0;
01391 
01392     if (!BLI_findlink(&ob->defbase, def_nr)) {
01393         return;
01394     }
01395 
01396     ED_vgroup_give_parray(ob->data, &dvert_array, &dvert_tot, use_vert_sel);
01397 
01398     if (dvert_array) {
01399         /* only the active group */
01400         for (i = 0; i < dvert_tot; i++) {
01401 
01402             /* in case its not selected */
01403             if (!(dv = dvert_array[i])) {
01404                 continue;
01405             }
01406 
01407             dw= defvert_find_index(dv, def_nr);
01408 
01409             if (dw) {
01410                 if (dw->weight <= epsilon) {
01411                     if (keep_single==FALSE || dv->totweight > 1) {
01412                         defvert_remove_group(dv, dw); /* dw can be NULL */
01413                     }
01414                 }
01415             }
01416         }
01417 
01418         MEM_freeN(dvert_array);
01419     }
01420 }
01421 
01422 static void vgroup_clean_all(Object *ob, const float epsilon, const int keep_single)
01423 {
01424     MDeformVert **dvert_array=NULL;
01425     int i, dvert_tot = 0;
01426     const int use_vert_sel = (ob->type == OB_MESH && ((Mesh *)ob->data)->editflag & ME_EDIT_VERT_SEL) != 0;
01427 
01428     ED_vgroup_give_parray(ob->data, &dvert_array, &dvert_tot, use_vert_sel);
01429 
01430     if (dvert_array) {
01431         MDeformVert *dv;
01432         MDeformWeight *dw;
01433 
01434         for (i = 0; i < dvert_tot; i++) {
01435             int j;
01436 
01437             /* in case its not selected */
01438             if (!(dv = dvert_array[i])) {
01439                 continue;
01440             }
01441 
01442             j= dv->totweight;
01443 
01444             while (j--) {
01445 
01446                 if (keep_single && dv->totweight == 1)
01447                     break;
01448 
01449                 dw= dv->dw + j;
01450 
01451                 if (dw->weight <= epsilon) {
01452                     defvert_remove_group(dv, dw);
01453                 }
01454             }
01455         }
01456 
01457         MEM_freeN(dvert_array);
01458     }
01459 }
01460 
01461 
01462 static void dvert_mirror_op(MDeformVert *dvert, MDeformVert *dvert_mirr,
01463                             const char sel, const char sel_mirr,
01464                             const int *flip_map, const int flip_map_len,
01465                             const short mirror_weights, const short flip_vgroups,
01466                             const short all_vgroups, const int act_vgroup)
01467 {
01468     BLI_assert(sel || sel_mirr);
01469 
01470     if (sel_mirr && sel) {
01471         /* swap */
01472         if (mirror_weights) {
01473             if (all_vgroups) {
01474                 SWAP(MDeformVert, *dvert, *dvert_mirr);
01475             }
01476             else {
01477                 MDeformWeight *dw=      defvert_find_index(dvert, act_vgroup);
01478                 MDeformWeight *dw_mirr= defvert_find_index(dvert_mirr, act_vgroup);
01479 
01480                 if (dw || dw_mirr) {
01481                     if (dw_mirr == NULL)
01482                         dw_mirr= defvert_verify_index(dvert_mirr, act_vgroup);
01483                     if (dw == NULL)
01484                         dw= defvert_verify_index(dvert, act_vgroup);
01485 
01486                     SWAP(float, dw->weight, dw_mirr->weight);
01487                 }
01488             }
01489         }
01490 
01491         if (flip_vgroups) {
01492             defvert_flip(dvert, flip_map, flip_map_len);
01493             defvert_flip(dvert_mirr, flip_map, flip_map_len);
01494         }
01495     }
01496     else {
01497         /* dvert should always be the target, only swaps pointer */
01498         if (sel_mirr) {
01499             SWAP(MDeformVert *, dvert, dvert_mirr);
01500         }
01501 
01502         if (mirror_weights) {
01503             if (all_vgroups) {
01504                 defvert_copy(dvert, dvert_mirr);
01505             }
01506             else {
01507                 defvert_copy_index(dvert, dvert_mirr, act_vgroup);
01508             }
01509         }
01510 
01511         /* flip map already modified for 'all_vgroups' */
01512         if (flip_vgroups) {
01513             defvert_flip(dvert, flip_map, flip_map_len);
01514         }
01515     }
01516 }
01517 
01518 /* TODO, vgroup locking */
01519 /* TODO, face masking */
01520 void ED_vgroup_mirror(Object *ob, const short mirror_weights, const short flip_vgroups, const short all_vgroups)
01521 {
01522 
01523 #define VGROUP_MIRR_OP                                                        \
01524         dvert_mirror_op(dvert, dvert_mirr,                                    \
01525                         sel, sel_mirr,                                        \
01526                         flip_map, flip_map_len,                               \
01527                         mirror_weights, flip_vgroups,                         \
01528                         all_vgroups, def_nr                                   \
01529                         )
01530 
01531     BMVert *eve, *eve_mirr;
01532     MDeformVert *dvert, *dvert_mirr;
01533     short sel, sel_mirr;
01534     int *flip_map, flip_map_len;
01535     const int def_nr= ob->actdef-1;
01536 
01537     if ( (mirror_weights==0 && flip_vgroups==0) ||
01538          (BLI_findlink(&ob->defbase, def_nr) == NULL) )
01539     {
01540         return;
01541     }
01542 
01543     if (flip_vgroups) {
01544         flip_map= all_vgroups ?
01545                     defgroup_flip_map(ob, &flip_map_len, FALSE) :
01546                     defgroup_flip_map_single(ob, &flip_map_len, FALSE, def_nr);
01547 
01548         BLI_assert(flip_map != NULL);
01549 
01550         if (flip_map == NULL) {
01551             /* something went wrong!, possibly no groups */
01552             return;
01553         }
01554     }
01555     else {
01556         flip_map= NULL;
01557         flip_map_len= 0;
01558     }
01559 
01560     /* only the active group */
01561     if (ob->type == OB_MESH) {
01562         Mesh *me= ob->data;
01563         BMEditMesh *em = me->edit_btmesh;
01564 
01565         if (em) {
01566             BMIter iter;
01567 
01568             if (!CustomData_has_layer(&em->bm->vdata, CD_MDEFORMVERT)) {
01569                 goto cleanup;
01570             }
01571 
01572             EDBM_verts_mirror_cache_begin(em, FALSE);
01573 
01574             /* Go through the list of editverts and assign them */
01575             BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
01576                 if ((eve_mirr= EDBM_verts_mirror_get(em, eve))) {
01577                     sel= BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
01578                     sel_mirr= BM_elem_flag_test(eve_mirr, BM_ELEM_SELECT);
01579 
01580                     if ((sel || sel_mirr) && (eve != eve_mirr)) {
01581                         dvert= CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
01582                         dvert_mirr= CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->vdata, eve_mirr->head.data, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
01583                         if (dvert && dvert_mirr) {
01584                             VGROUP_MIRR_OP;
01585                         }
01586                     }
01587 
01588                     /* don't use these again */
01589                     EDBM_verts_mirror_cache_clear(em, eve);
01590                     EDBM_verts_mirror_cache_clear(em, eve_mirr);
01591                 }
01592             }
01593             EDBM_verts_mirror_cache_end(em);
01594         }
01595         else {
01596             /* object mode / weight paint */
01597             MVert *mv, *mv_mirr;
01598             int vidx, vidx_mirr;
01599             const int use_vert_sel = (me->editflag & ME_EDIT_VERT_SEL) != 0;
01600 
01601             if (me->dvert == NULL) {
01602                 goto cleanup;
01603             }
01604 
01605             if (!use_vert_sel) {
01606                 sel= sel_mirr= TRUE;
01607             }
01608 
01609             /* tag verts we have used */
01610             for (vidx= 0, mv= me->mvert; vidx < me->totvert; vidx++, mv++) {
01611                 mv->flag &= ~ME_VERT_TMP_TAG;
01612             }
01613 
01614             for (vidx= 0, mv= me->mvert; vidx < me->totvert; vidx++, mv++) {
01615                 if (    ((mv->flag & ME_VERT_TMP_TAG) == 0) &&
01616                         ((vidx_mirr= mesh_get_x_mirror_vert(ob, vidx)) != -1) &&
01617                         (vidx != vidx_mirr) &&
01618                         ((((mv_mirr= me->mvert + vidx_mirr)->flag) & ME_VERT_TMP_TAG) == 0))
01619                 {
01620 
01621                     if (use_vert_sel) {
01622                         sel= mv->flag & SELECT;
01623                         sel_mirr= mv_mirr->flag & SELECT;
01624                     }
01625 
01626                     if (sel || sel_mirr) {
01627                         dvert= &me->dvert[vidx];
01628                         dvert_mirr= &me->dvert[vidx_mirr];
01629 
01630                         VGROUP_MIRR_OP;
01631                     }
01632 
01633                     mv->flag |= ME_VERT_TMP_TAG;
01634                     mv_mirr->flag |= ME_VERT_TMP_TAG;
01635                 }
01636             }
01637         }
01638     }
01639     else if (ob->type == OB_LATTICE) {
01640         Lattice *lt= vgroup_edit_lattice(ob);
01641         int i1, i2;
01642         int u, v, w;
01643         int pntsu_half;
01644         /* half but found up odd value */
01645 
01646         if (lt->pntsu == 1 || lt->dvert == NULL) {
01647             goto cleanup;
01648         }
01649 
01650         /* unlike editmesh we know that by only looping over the first half of
01651          * the 'u' indices it will cover all points except the middle which is
01652          * ok in this case */
01653         pntsu_half= lt->pntsu / 2;
01654 
01655         for (w=0; w<lt->pntsw; w++) {
01656             for (v=0; v<lt->pntsv; v++) {
01657                 for (u=0; u<pntsu_half; u++) {
01658                     int u_inv= (lt->pntsu - 1) - u;
01659                     if (u != u_inv) {
01660                         BPoint *bp, *bp_mirr;
01661 
01662                         i1= LT_INDEX(lt, u, v, w);
01663                         i2= LT_INDEX(lt, u_inv, v, w);
01664 
01665                         bp= &lt->def[i1];
01666                         bp_mirr= &lt->def[i2];
01667 
01668                         sel= bp->f1 & SELECT;
01669                         sel_mirr= bp_mirr->f1 & SELECT;
01670 
01671                         if (sel || sel_mirr) {
01672                             dvert= &lt->dvert[i1];
01673                             dvert_mirr= &lt->dvert[i2];
01674 
01675                             VGROUP_MIRR_OP;
01676                         }
01677                     }
01678                 }
01679             }
01680         }
01681     }
01682 
01683 cleanup:
01684     if (flip_map) MEM_freeN(flip_map);
01685 
01686 #undef VGROUP_MIRR_OP
01687 
01688 }
01689 
01690 static void vgroup_remap_update_users(Object *ob, int *map)
01691 {
01692     ExplodeModifierData *emd;
01693     ModifierData *md;
01694     ParticleSystem *psys;
01695     ClothModifierData *clmd;
01696     ClothSimSettings *clsim;
01697     int a;
01698 
01699     /* these cases don't use names to refer to vertex groups, so when
01700      * they get deleted the numbers get out of sync, this corrects that */
01701 
01702     if (ob->soft)
01703         ob->soft->vertgroup= map[ob->soft->vertgroup];
01704 
01705     for (md=ob->modifiers.first; md; md=md->next) {
01706         if (md->type == eModifierType_Explode) {
01707             emd= (ExplodeModifierData*)md;
01708             emd->vgroup= map[emd->vgroup];
01709         }
01710         else if (md->type == eModifierType_Cloth) {
01711             clmd= (ClothModifierData*)md;
01712             clsim= clmd->sim_parms;
01713 
01714             if (clsim) {
01715                 clsim->vgroup_mass= map[clsim->vgroup_mass];
01716                 clsim->vgroup_bend= map[clsim->vgroup_bend];
01717                 clsim->vgroup_struct= map[clsim->vgroup_struct];
01718             }
01719         }
01720     }
01721 
01722     for (psys=ob->particlesystem.first; psys; psys=psys->next) {
01723         for (a=0; a<PSYS_TOT_VG; a++)
01724             psys->vgroup[a]= map[psys->vgroup[a]];
01725     }
01726 }
01727 
01728 
01729 static void vgroup_delete_update_users(Object *ob, int id)
01730 {
01731     int i, defbase_tot= BLI_countlist(&ob->defbase) + 1;
01732     int *map= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(int) * defbase_tot, "vgroup del");
01733 
01734     map[id]= map[0]= 0;
01735     for (i=1; i<id; i++) map[i]=i;
01736     for (i=id+1; i<defbase_tot; i++) map[i]=i-1;
01737 
01738     vgroup_remap_update_users(ob, map);
01739     MEM_freeN(map);
01740 }
01741 
01742 
01743 static void vgroup_delete_object_mode(Object *ob, bDeformGroup *dg)
01744 {
01745     MDeformVert *dvert_array=NULL;
01746     int dvert_tot=0;
01747     const int def_nr= BLI_findindex(&ob->defbase, dg);
01748 
01749     assert(def_nr > -1);
01750 
01751     ED_vgroup_give_array(ob->data, &dvert_array, &dvert_tot);
01752 
01753     if (dvert_array) {
01754         int i, j;
01755         MDeformVert *dv;
01756         for (i= 0, dv= dvert_array; i < dvert_tot; i++, dv++) {
01757             MDeformWeight *dw;
01758 
01759             dw= defvert_find_index(dv, def_nr);
01760             defvert_remove_group(dv, dw); /* dw can be NULL */
01761 
01762             /* inline, make into a function if anything else needs to do this */
01763             for (j = 0; j < dv->totweight; j++) {
01764                 if (dv->dw[j].def_nr > def_nr) {
01765                     dv->dw[j].def_nr--;
01766                 }
01767             }
01768             /* done */
01769         }
01770     }
01771 
01772     vgroup_delete_update_users(ob, def_nr + 1);
01773 
01774     /* Remove the group */
01775     BLI_freelinkN(&ob->defbase, dg);
01776 
01777     /* Update the active deform index if necessary */
01778     if (ob->actdef > def_nr)
01779         ob->actdef--;
01780     if (ob->actdef < 1 && ob->defbase.first)
01781         ob->actdef= 1;
01782 
01783 }
01784 
01785 /* only in editmode */
01786 /* removes from active defgroup, if allverts==0 only selected vertices */
01787 static void vgroup_active_remove_verts(Object *ob, const int allverts, bDeformGroup *dg)
01788 {
01789     MDeformVert *dv;
01790     const int def_nr= BLI_findindex(&ob->defbase, dg);
01791 
01792     if (ob->type == OB_MESH) {
01793         Mesh *me= ob->data;
01794 
01795         if (me->edit_btmesh) {
01796             BMEditMesh *em = me->edit_btmesh;
01797             BMVert *eve;
01798             BMIter iter;
01799 
01800             BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
01801                 dv= CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
01802 
01803                 if (dv && dv->dw && (allverts || BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT))) {
01804                     MDeformWeight *dw = defvert_find_index(dv, def_nr);
01805                     defvert_remove_group(dv, dw); /* dw can be NULL */
01806                 }
01807             }
01808         }
01809         else {
01810             MVert *mv;
01811             MDeformVert *dv;
01812             int i;
01813 
01814             if (!me->dvert) {
01815                 ED_vgroup_data_create(&me->id);
01816             }
01817 
01818             mv = me->mvert;
01819             dv = me->dvert;
01820 
01821             for (i=0; i<me->totvert; i++, mv++, dv++) {
01822                 if (mv->flag & SELECT) {
01823                     if (dv->dw && (allverts || (mv->flag & SELECT))) {
01824                         MDeformWeight *dw = defvert_find_index(dv, def_nr);
01825                         defvert_remove_group(dv, dw); /* dw can be NULL */
01826                     }
01827                 }
01828             }
01829         }
01830     }
01831     else if (ob->type == OB_LATTICE) {
01832         Lattice *lt= vgroup_edit_lattice(ob);
01833         
01834         if (lt->dvert) {
01835             BPoint *bp;
01836             int i, tot= lt->pntsu*lt->pntsv*lt->pntsw;
01837                 
01838             for (i=0, bp= lt->def; i<tot; i++, bp++) {
01839                 if (allverts || (bp->f1 & SELECT)) {
01840                     MDeformWeight *dw;
01841 
01842                     dv= &lt->dvert[i];
01843 
01844                     dw = defvert_find_index(dv, def_nr);
01845                     defvert_remove_group(dv, dw); /* dw can be NULL */
01846                 }
01847             }
01848         }
01849     }
01850 }
01851 
01852 static void vgroup_delete_edit_mode(Object *ob, bDeformGroup *dg)
01853 {
01854     int i;
01855     const int dg_index= BLI_findindex(&ob->defbase, dg);
01856 
01857     assert(dg_index > -1);
01858 
01859     /* Make sure that no verts are using this group */
01860     vgroup_active_remove_verts(ob, TRUE, dg);
01861 
01862     /* Make sure that any verts with higher indices are adjusted accordingly */
01863     if (ob->type==OB_MESH) {
01864         Mesh *me= ob->data;
01865         BMEditMesh *em = me->edit_btmesh;
01866         BMIter iter;
01867         BMVert *eve;
01868         MDeformVert *dvert;
01869         
01870         BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
01871             dvert= CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
01872 
01873             if (dvert)
01874                 for (i=0; i<dvert->totweight; i++)
01875                     if (dvert->dw[i].def_nr > dg_index)
01876                         dvert->dw[i].def_nr--;
01877         }
01878     }
01879     else if (ob->type==OB_LATTICE) {
01880         Lattice *lt= vgroup_edit_lattice(ob);
01881         BPoint *bp;
01882         MDeformVert *dvert= lt->dvert;
01883         int a, tot;
01884         
01885         if (dvert) {
01886             tot= lt->pntsu*lt->pntsv*lt->pntsw;
01887             for (a=0, bp= lt->def; a<tot; a++, bp++, dvert++) {
01888                 for (i=0; i<dvert->totweight; i++) {
01889                     if (dvert->dw[i].def_nr > dg_index)
01890                         dvert->dw[i].def_nr--;
01891                 }
01892             }
01893         }
01894     }
01895 
01896     vgroup_delete_update_users(ob, dg_index + 1);
01897 
01898     /* Remove the group */
01899     BLI_freelinkN (&ob->defbase, dg);
01900 
01901     /* Update the active deform index if necessary */
01902     if (ob->actdef > dg_index)
01903         ob->actdef--;
01904     if (ob->actdef < 1 && ob->defbase.first)
01905         ob->actdef= 1;
01906 
01907     /* remove all dverts */
01908     if (ob->defbase.first == NULL) {
01909         if (ob->type==OB_MESH) {
01910             Mesh *me= ob->data;
01911             CustomData_free_layer_active(&me->vdata, CD_MDEFORMVERT, me->totvert);
01912             me->dvert= NULL;
01913         }
01914         else if (ob->type==OB_LATTICE) {
01915             Lattice *lt= vgroup_edit_lattice(ob);
01916             if (lt->dvert) {
01917                 MEM_freeN(lt->dvert);
01918                 lt->dvert= NULL;
01919             }
01920         }
01921     }
01922 }
01923 
01924 static int vgroup_object_in_edit_mode(Object *ob)
01925 {
01926     if (ob->type == OB_MESH)
01927         return (BMEdit_FromObject(ob) != NULL);
01928     else if (ob->type == OB_LATTICE)
01929         return (((Lattice*)ob->data)->editlatt != NULL);
01930     
01931     return 0;
01932 }
01933 
01934 static int vgroup_object_in_wpaint_vert_select(Object *ob)
01935 {
01936     if (ob->type == OB_MESH) {
01937         Mesh *me = ob->data;
01938         return ( (ob->mode & OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT) &&
01939                  (me->edit_btmesh == NULL) &&
01940                  (ME_EDIT_PAINT_SEL_MODE(me) == SCE_SELECT_VERTEX) );
01941     }
01942 
01943     return 0;
01944 }
01945 
01946 static void vgroup_delete(Object *ob)
01947 {
01948     bDeformGroup *dg = BLI_findlink(&ob->defbase, ob->actdef-1);
01949     if (!dg)
01950         return;
01951 
01952     if (vgroup_object_in_edit_mode(ob))
01953         vgroup_delete_edit_mode(ob, dg);
01954     else
01955         vgroup_delete_object_mode(ob, dg);
01956 }
01957 
01958 static void vgroup_delete_all(Object *ob)
01959 {
01960     /* Remove all DVerts */
01961     if (ob->type==OB_MESH) {
01962         Mesh *me= ob->data;
01963         CustomData_free_layer_active(&me->vdata, CD_MDEFORMVERT, me->totvert);
01964         me->dvert= NULL;
01965     }
01966     else if (ob->type==OB_LATTICE) {
01967         Lattice *lt= vgroup_edit_lattice(ob);
01968         if (lt->dvert) {
01969             MEM_freeN(lt->dvert);
01970             lt->dvert= NULL;
01971         }
01972     }
01973     
01974     /* Remove all DefGroups */
01975     BLI_freelistN(&ob->defbase);
01976     
01977     /* Fix counters/indices */
01978     ob->actdef= 0;
01979 }
01980 
01981 /* only in editmode */
01982 static void vgroup_assign_verts(Object *ob, const float weight)
01983 {
01984     MDeformVert *dv;
01985     const int def_nr= ob->actdef-1;
01986 
01987     if (!BLI_findlink(&ob->defbase, def_nr))
01988         return;
01989 
01990     if (ob->type == OB_MESH) {
01991         Mesh *me= ob->data;
01992 
01993         if (me->edit_btmesh) {
01994             BMEditMesh *em = me->edit_btmesh;
01995             BMIter iter;
01996             BMVert *eve;
01997 
01998             if (!CustomData_has_layer(&em->bm->vdata, CD_MDEFORMVERT))
01999                 BM_data_layer_add(em->bm, &em->bm->vdata, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
02000 
02001             /* Go through the list of editverts and assign them */
02002             BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
02003                 if (BM_elem_flag_test(eve, BM_ELEM_SELECT)) {
02004                     MDeformWeight *dw;
02005                     dv= CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_MDEFORMVERT); /* can be NULL */
02006                     dw= defvert_verify_index(dv, def_nr);
02007                     if (dw) {
02008                         dw->weight= weight;
02009                     }
02010                 }
02011             }
02012         }
02013         else {
02014             MVert *mv;
02015             MDeformVert *dv;
02016             int i;
02017 
02018             if (!me->dvert) {
02019                 ED_vgroup_data_create(&me->id);
02020             }
02021 
02022             mv = me->mvert;
02023             dv = me->dvert;
02024 
02025             for (i=0; i<me->totvert; i++, mv++, dv++) {
02026                 if (mv->flag & SELECT) {
02027                     MDeformWeight *dw;
02028                     dw= defvert_verify_index(dv, def_nr);
02029                     if (dw) {
02030                         dw->weight= weight;
02031                     }
02032                 }
02033             }
02034         }
02035     }
02036     else if (ob->type == OB_LATTICE) {
02037         Lattice *lt= vgroup_edit_lattice(ob);
02038         BPoint *bp;
02039         int a, tot;
02040 
02041         if (lt->dvert==NULL)
02042             ED_vgroup_data_create(&lt->id);
02043 
02044         dv= lt->dvert;
02045 
02046         tot= lt->pntsu*lt->pntsv*lt->pntsw;
02047         for (a=0, bp= lt->def; a<tot; a++, bp++, dv++) {
02048             if (bp->f1 & SELECT) {
02049                 MDeformWeight *dw;
02050 
02051                 dw= defvert_verify_index(dv, def_nr);
02052                 if (dw) {
02053                     dw->weight= weight;
02054                 }
02055             }
02056         }
02057     }
02058 }
02059 
02060 /* only in editmode */
02061 /* removes from all defgroup, if allverts==0 only selected vertices */
02062 static void vgroup_remove_verts(Object *ob, int allverts)
02063 {
02064     /* To prevent code redundancy, we just use vgroup_active_remove_verts, but that
02065      * only operates on the active vgroup. So we iterate through all groups, by changing
02066      * active group index
02067      */
02068     bDeformGroup *dg;
02069     for (dg= ob->defbase.first; dg; dg= dg->next) {
02070         vgroup_active_remove_verts(ob, allverts, dg);
02071     }
02072 }
02073 
02074 /********************** vertex group operators *********************/
02075 
02076 static int vertex_group_poll(bContext *C)
02077 {
02078     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
02079     ID *data= (ob)? ob->data: NULL;
02080     return (ob && !ob->id.lib && OB_TYPE_SUPPORT_VGROUP(ob->type) && data && !data->lib);
02081 }
02082 
02083 static int UNUSED_FUNCTION(vertex_group_poll_edit)(bContext *C)
02084 {
02085     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
02086     ID *data= (ob)? ob->data: NULL;
02087 
02088     if (!(ob && !ob->id.lib && data && !data->lib))
02089         return 0;
02090 
02091     return vgroup_object_in_edit_mode(ob);
02092 }
02093 
02094 /* editmode _or_ weight paint vertex sel */
02095 static int vertex_group_poll_edit_or_wpaint_vert_select(bContext *C)
02096 {
02097     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
02098     ID *data= (ob)? ob->data: NULL;
02099 
02100     if (!(ob && !ob->id.lib && data && !data->lib))
02101         return 0;
02102 
02103     return ( vgroup_object_in_edit_mode(ob) ||
02104              vgroup_object_in_wpaint_vert_select(ob) );
02105 }
02106 
02107 static int vertex_group_add_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
02108 {
02109     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
02110 
02111     ED_vgroup_add(ob);
02112     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
02113     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM|ND_DATA, ob->data);
02114     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, ob);
02115     
02116     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02117 }
02118 
02119 void OBJECT_OT_vertex_group_add(wmOperatorType *ot)
02120 {
02121     /* identifiers */
02122     ot->name = "Add Vertex Group";
02123     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_vertex_group_add";
02124     
02125     /* api callbacks */
02126     ot->poll = vertex_group_poll;
02127     ot->exec = vertex_group_add_exec;
02128 
02129     /* flags */
02130     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
02131 }
02132 
02133 static int vertex_group_remove_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02134 {
02135     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
02136 
02137     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "all"))
02138         vgroup_delete_all(ob);
02139     else
02140         vgroup_delete(ob);
02141 
02142     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
02143     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM|ND_DATA, ob->data);
02144     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, ob);
02145     
02146     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02147 }
02148 
02149 void OBJECT_OT_vertex_group_remove(wmOperatorType *ot)
02150 {
02151     /* identifiers */
02152     ot->name = "Remove Vertex Group";
02153     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_vertex_group_remove";
02154     
02155     /* api callbacks */
02156     ot->poll = vertex_group_poll;
02157     ot->exec = vertex_group_remove_exec;
02158 
02159     /* flags */
02160     /* redo operator will fail in this case because vertex groups aren't stored
02161      * in local edit mode stack and toggling "all" property will lead to
02162      * all groups deleted without way to restore them (see [#29527], sergey) */
02163     ot->flag = /*OPTYPE_REGISTER|*/OPTYPE_UNDO;
02164 
02165     /* properties */
02166     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "all", 0, "All", "Remove from all vertex groups");
02167 }
02168 
02169 static int vertex_group_assign_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02170 {
02171     ToolSettings *ts= CTX_data_tool_settings(C);
02172     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
02173 
02174     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "new"))
02175         ED_vgroup_add(ob);
02176 
02177     vgroup_assign_verts(ob, ts->vgroup_weight);
02178     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
02179     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM|ND_DATA, ob->data);
02180     
02181     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02182 }
02183 
02184 void OBJECT_OT_vertex_group_assign(wmOperatorType *ot)
02185 {
02186     /* identifiers */
02187     ot->name = "Assign Vertex Group";
02188     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_vertex_group_assign";
02189     
02190     /* api callbacks */
02191     ot->poll = vertex_group_poll_edit_or_wpaint_vert_select;
02192     ot->exec = vertex_group_assign_exec;
02193 
02194     /* flags */
02195     /* redo operator will fail in this case because vertex group assignment
02196      * isn't stored in local edit mode stack and toggling "new" property will
02197      * lead to creating plenty of new vertex groups (see [#29527], sergey) */
02198     ot->flag = /*OPTYPE_REGISTER|*/OPTYPE_UNDO;
02199 
02200     /* properties */
02201     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "new", 0, "New", "Assign vertex to new vertex group");
02202 }
02203 
02204 static int vertex_group_remove_from_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02205 {
02206     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
02207 
02208     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "all"))
02209         vgroup_remove_verts(ob, 0);
02210     else {
02211         bDeformGroup *dg= BLI_findlink(&ob->defbase, ob->actdef - 1);
02212 
02213         if (dg == NULL) {
02214             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02215         }
02216 
02217         vgroup_active_remove_verts(ob, FALSE, dg);
02218     }
02219 
02220     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
02221     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM|ND_DATA, ob->data);
02222 
02223     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02224 }
02225 
02226 void OBJECT_OT_vertex_group_remove_from(wmOperatorType *ot)
02227 {
02228     /* identifiers */
02229     ot->name = "Remove from Vertex Group";
02230     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_vertex_group_remove_from";
02231 
02232     /* api callbacks */
02233     ot->poll = vertex_group_poll_edit_or_wpaint_vert_select;
02234     ot->exec = vertex_group_remove_from_exec;
02235 
02236     /* flags */
02237     /* redo operator will fail in this case because vertex groups assignment
02238      * isn't stored in local edit mode stack and toggling "all" property will lead to
02239      * removing vertices from all groups (see [#29527], sergey) */
02240     ot->flag = /*OPTYPE_REGISTER|*/OPTYPE_UNDO;
02241 
02242     /* properties */
02243     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "all", 0, "All", "Remove from all vertex groups");
02244 }
02245

02247 {

02249 
02250     if (!ob || ob->id.lib)
02251         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02252 
02253     vgroup_select_verts(ob, 1);
02254     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM|ND_SELECT, ob->data);
02255 
02256     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02257 }
