02413 
02414 static int vertex_group_fix_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02415 {
02416     Object *ob= CTX_data_active_object(C);
02417     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
02418     
02419     float distToBe= RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "dist");
02420     float strength= RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "strength");
02421     float cp= RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "accuracy");
02422     ModifierData *md= ob->modifiers.first;
02423 
02424     while (md) {
02425         if (md->type == eModifierType_Mirror && (md->mode&eModifierMode_Realtime)) {
02426             break;
02427         }
02428         md = md->next;
02429     }
02430     
02431     if (md && md->type == eModifierType_Mirror) {
02432         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR_INVALID_CONTEXT, "This operator does not support an active mirror modifier");
02433         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02434     }
02435     vgroup_fix(scene, ob, distToBe, strength, cp);
02436     
02437     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
02438     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, ob);
02439     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM|ND_DATA, ob->data);
02440     
02441     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02442 }
02443 
02444 void OBJECT_OT_vertex_group_fix(wmOperatorType *ot)
02445 {
02446     /* identifiers */
02447     ot->name = "Fix Vertex Group Deform";
02448     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_vertex_group_fix";
02449     ot->description = "Modify the position of selected vertices by changing only their respective "
02450                      "groups' weights (this tool may be slow for many vertices)";
02451     
02452     /* api callbacks */
02453     ot->poll = vertex_group_poll;
02454     ot->exec = vertex_group_fix_exec;
02455     
02456     /* flags */
02457     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
02458     RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "dist", 0.0f, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, "Distance", "The distance to move to", -10.0f, 10.0f);
02459     RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "strength", 1.f, -2.0f, FLT_MAX, "Strength",
02460                   "The distance moved can be changed by this multiplier", -2.0f, 2.0f);
02461     RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "accuracy", 1.0f, 0.05f, FLT_MAX, "Change Sensitivity",
02462                   "Change the amount weights are altered with each iteration: lower values are slower", 0.05f, 1.f);
02463 }

02525 
02526 
02527 static int vertex_group_blend_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02528 {
02529     Object *ob = ED_object_context(C);
02530     float fac = RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "factor");
02531 
02532     vgroup_blend(ob, fac);
02533 
02534     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
02535     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, ob);
02536     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM|ND_DATA, ob->data);
02537 
02538     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02539 }
02540 
02541 /* check we have a vertex selection, either in weight paint or editmode */
02542 static int vertex_group_blend_poll(bContext *C)
02543 {
02544     Object *ob = ED_object_context(C);
02545     ID *data = (ob) ? ob->data: NULL;
02546 
02547     if (!(ob && !ob->id.lib && data && !data->lib))
02548         return FALSE;
02549 
02550     if (vgroup_object_in_edit_mode(ob)) {
02551         return TRUE;
02552     }
02553     else if ((ob->type == OB_MESH) && (ob->mode & OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT)) {
02554         if (ME_EDIT_PAINT_SEL_MODE(((Mesh *)data)) == SCE_SELECT_VERTEX) {
02555             return TRUE;
02556         }
02557         else {
02558             CTX_wm_operator_poll_msg_set(C, "Vertex select needs to be enabled in weight paint mode");
02559             return FALSE;
02560         }
02561 
02562     }
02563     else {
02564         return FALSE;
02565     }
02566 }

02580 
02581     /* flags */

02583

02585     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Factor", "");
02586     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, 1.0f);

02668 static int vertex_group_copy_to_linked_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
02669 {
02670     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
02671     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
02672     Base *base;
02673     int retval= OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02674 
02675     for (base=scene->base.first; base; base= base->next) {
02676         if (base->object->type==ob->type) {
02677             if (base->object!=ob && base->object->data==ob->data) {
02678                 BLI_freelistN(&base->object->defbase);
02679                 BLI_duplicatelist(&base->object->defbase, &ob->defbase);
02680                 base->object->actdef= ob->actdef;
02681 
02682                 DAG_id_tag_update(&base->object->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
02683                 WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, base->object);
02684                 WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM|ND_DATA, base->object->data);
02685 
02686                 retval = OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02687             }
02688         }
02689     }
02690 
02691     return retval;
02692 }

02709 static int vertex_group_copy_to_selected_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02710 {
02711     Object *obact= ED_object_context(C);
02712     int change= 0;
02713     int fail= 0;
02714 
02715     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, ob, selected_editable_objects)
02716     {
02717         if (obact != ob) {
02718             if (ED_vgroup_copy_array(ob, obact)) change++;
02719             else                                fail++;
02720         }
02721     }
02722     CTX_DATA_END;
02723 
02724     if ((change == 0 && fail == 0) || fail) {
02725         BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_ERROR,
02726                     "Copy to VGroups to Selected warning done %d, failed %d, object data must have matching indices",
02727                     change, fail);
02728     }
02729 
02730     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02731 }

02749 static EnumPropertyItem vgroup_items[]= {
02750     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
02751 
02752 static int set_active_group_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02753 {
02754     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
02755     int nr= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "group");
02756 
02757     BLI_assert(nr+1 >= 0);
02758     ob->actdef= nr+1;
02759 
02760     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
02761     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM|ND_DATA, ob);
02762 
02763     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02764 }
02765 
02766 static EnumPropertyItem *vgroup_itemf(bContext *C, PointerRNA *UNUSED(ptr), PropertyRNA *UNUSED(prop), int *free)
02767 {   
02768     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
02769     EnumPropertyItem tmp = {0, "", 0, "", ""};
02770     EnumPropertyItem *item= NULL;
02771     bDeformGroup *def;
02772     int a, totitem= 0;
02773     
02774     if (!ob)
02775         return vgroup_items;
02776     
02777     for (a=0, def=ob->defbase.first; def; def=def->next, a++) {
02778         tmp.value= a;
02779         tmp.icon= ICON_GROUP_VERTEX;
02780         tmp.identifier= def->name;
02781         tmp.name= def->name;
02782         RNA_enum_item_add(&item, &totitem, &tmp);
02783     }
02784 
02785     RNA_enum_item_end(&item, &totitem);
02786     *free= 1;
02787 
02788     return item;
02789 }

02813 
02814 /* creates the name_array parameter for vgroup_do_remap, call this before fiddling
02815  * with the order of vgroups then call vgroup_do_remap after*/
02816 static char *vgroup_init_remap(Object *ob)
02817 {
02818     bDeformGroup *def;
02819     int defbase_tot = BLI_countlist(&ob->defbase);
02820     char *name_array= MEM_mallocN(MAX_VGROUP_NAME * sizeof(char) * defbase_tot, "sort vgroups");
02821     char *name;
02822 
02823     name= name_array;
02824     for (def = ob->defbase.first; def; def=def->next) {
02825         BLI_strncpy(name, def->name, MAX_VGROUP_NAME);
02826         name += MAX_VGROUP_NAME;
02827     }
02828 
02829     return name_array;
02830 }
02831 
02832 static int vgroup_do_remap(Object *ob, char *name_array, wmOperator *op)
02833 {
02834     MDeformVert *dvert= NULL;
02835     bDeformGroup *def;
02836     int defbase_tot = BLI_countlist(&ob->defbase);
02837 
02838     /* needs a dummy index at the start*/
02839     int *sort_map_update= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(int) * (defbase_tot + 1), "sort vgroups");
02840     int *sort_map= sort_map_update + 1;
02841 
02842     char *name;
02843     int i;
02844 
02845     name= name_array;
02846     for (def= ob->defbase.first, i=0; def; def=def->next, i++) {
02847         sort_map[i]= BLI_findstringindex(&ob->defbase, name, offsetof(bDeformGroup, name));
02848         name += MAX_VGROUP_NAME;
02849 
02850         BLI_assert(sort_map[i] != -1);
02851     }
02852 
02853     if (ob->mode == OB_MODE_EDIT) {
02854         if (ob->type==OB_MESH) {
02855             BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(ob);
02856             BMIter iter;
02857             BMVert *eve;
02858 
02859             BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, em->bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
02860                 dvert= CustomData_bmesh_get(&em->bm->vdata, eve->head.data, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
02861                 if (dvert && dvert->totweight) {
02862                     defvert_remap(dvert, sort_map, defbase_tot);
02863                 }
02864             }
02865         }
02866         else {
02867             BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Editmode lattice isn't supported yet");
02868             MEM_freeN(sort_map_update);
02869             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02870         }
02871     }
02872     else {
02873         int dvert_tot=0;
02874 
02875         ED_vgroup_give_array(ob->data, &dvert, &dvert_tot);
02876 
02877         /*create as necessary*/
02878         while (dvert && dvert_tot--) {
02879             if (dvert->totweight)
02880                 defvert_remap(dvert, sort_map, defbase_tot);
02881             dvert++;
02882         }
02883     }
02884 
02885     /* update users */
02886     for (i=0; i<defbase_tot; i++)
02887         sort_map[i]++;
02888 
02889     sort_map_update[0]= 0;
02890     vgroup_remap_update_users(ob, sort_map_update);
02891 
02892     BLI_assert(sort_map_update[ob->actdef] >= 0);
02893     ob->actdef= sort_map_update[ob->actdef];
02894     
02895     MEM_freeN(sort_map_update);
02896 
02897     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02898 }
02899 
02900 static int vgroup_sort(void *def_a_ptr, void *def_b_ptr)
02901 {
02902     bDeformGroup *def_a= (bDeformGroup *)def_a_ptr;
02903     bDeformGroup *def_b= (bDeformGroup *)def_b_ptr;
02904 
02905     return BLI_natstrcmp(def_a->name, def_b->name);
02906 }
02907 
02908 static int vertex_group_sort_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02909 {
02910     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
02911     char *name_array;
02912     int ret;
02913 
02914     /*init remapping*/
02915     name_array = vgroup_init_remap(ob);
02916 
02917     /*sort vgroup names*/
02918     BLI_sortlist(&ob->defbase, vgroup_sort);
02919 
02920     /*remap vgroup data to map to correct names*/
02921     ret = vgroup_do_remap(ob, name_array, op);
02922 
02923     if (ret != OPERATOR_CANCELLED) {
02924         DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
02925         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM|ND_DATA, ob);
02926     }
02927 
02928     if (name_array) MEM_freeN(name_array);
02929 
02930     return ret;
02931 }
02932 
02933 void OBJECT_OT_vertex_group_sort(wmOperatorType *ot)
02934 {
02935     ot->name = "Sort Vertex Groups";
02936     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_vertex_group_sort";
02937     ot->description = "Sorts vertex groups alphabetically";
02938 
02939     /* api callbacks */
02940     ot->poll = vertex_group_poll;
02941     ot->exec = vertex_group_sort_exec;
02942 
02943     /* flags */
02944     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
02945 }
02946 
02947 static int vgroup_move_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02948 {
02949     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
02950     bDeformGroup *def;
02951     char *name_array;
02952     int dir= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "direction"), ret;
02953 
02954     def = BLI_findlink(&ob->defbase, ob->actdef - 1);
02955     if (!def) {
02956         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02957     }
02958 
02959     name_array = vgroup_init_remap(ob);
02960 
02961     if (dir == 1) { /*up*/
02962         void *prev = def->prev;
02963 
02964         BLI_remlink(&ob->defbase, def);
02965         BLI_insertlinkbefore(&ob->defbase, prev, def);
02966     }
02967     else { /*down*/
02968         void *next = def->next;
02969 
02970         BLI_remlink(&ob->defbase, def);
02971         BLI_insertlinkafter(&ob->defbase, next, def);
02972     }
02973 
02974     ret = vgroup_do_remap(ob, name_array, op);
02975 
02976     if (name_array) MEM_freeN(name_array);
02977 
02978     if (ret != OPERATOR_CANCELLED) {
02979         DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
02980         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM|ND_DATA, ob);
02981     }
02982 
02983     return ret;
02984 }
02985

02989         {1, "UP", 0, "Up", ""},
02990         {-1, "DOWN", 0, "Down", ""},
02991         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
02992     };
02993 
02994     /* identifiers */
02995     ot->name = "Move Vertex Group";
02996     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_vertex_group_move";
02997 
02998     /* api callbacks */

03000     ot->exec = vgroup_move_exec;
03001 
03002     /* flags */
03003     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
03004 
03005     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "direction", vgroup_slot_move, 0, "Direction", "Direction to move, UP or DOWN");
03006 }
